alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Morrison; Pope; Stearns; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:29AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Douglas, Pope, southern Todd, northwestern Stearns and west central Morrison Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 428 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Starbuck to 5 miles southwest of Melrose. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Melrose around 435 AM CDT. Sauk Centre around 440 AM CDT. Grey Eagle around 445 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Alexandria, Long Prairie, Brandon, Swanville and Carlos. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 89 and 137. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 132 and 135. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 155 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central and west central Minnesota.
